title: Poppy ult bug
body: Found a bug where if Poppy fully charged ults an enemy champion close enough (seems to be anywhere behind nexus towers) to the enemy fountain, she will knock that champion off the map. Caused enemy champion to not be able to respawn properly - kept saying they were being executed upon spawning.

replies.body: That happened to me last game, Poppy smacked J4 off the map and he couldn't spawn for 10 minutes
what champ was it? might only be a certain champion
done it to zyra, mundo, ramus, lux and ez so far across about 4 games
did you kill them when you hit them?
a couple of times, but it doesn't seem to matter if they're dead or not - they still get locked out of spawning

Poppy's r doesnt to the knockback if it kills them.

Tried it in a custom and it wouldn't knockback no matter what if they died

and couldn't knock them past the well tower either
